flawed_nl_solution:
The shop offers 100 flavors and she tried 1/4 of the flavors so she had 100*0.25 = <<100*0.25=25>>25 flavors 2 years ago
Last year she ate double the amount from the previous year so she had 25*2 = <<25*2=50>>50 flavors
2 years ago she ate 25 flavors and last year she had 50 flavors so she has had 25+50 = <<25+50=78>>78 flavors
The shop offers 100 flavors and she has had 78 flavors so she still needs to try 100-78 = <<100-78=22>>22 flavors
#### 22

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 78. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
